name: Adventure of Gar-Na (English Version)
description:
Welcome to Adventure of Gar-Na.

Adventure of Gar-na is my first project made in twine.

This game has scenes +18 with tf theme.

---

Welcome to the test version of Adventure of Gar-Na.

This is the first of (hopefully) many versions. In this version there is a total of 6 transformations and indications of the mechanics that i will add.

 Expect bugs and errors as this is a super early version of the game.

Enjoy :)

---

Adventure of Gar-Na TEST VERSION 0.1.1

Changes and fixes:

Slime fight is now dice based: Slime fight is now dice based. And I decided to do it like this so that the defeat or victory is more visual and beautiful.

I have also fixed some bugs and added some details.

Added:

Images: I add images for the part of the house.

NPC: I've added Bjarni! The first npc, you will find Bjarni in the shop.

Quests: The first quest is available, the quest will be given to you by Bjarni in his shop.

Potion: The health potion can now be used from inventory.

House: Now you can enter your house.

Mirror: Now you can look at yourself in the mirror at home and thus be able to see your appearance and status.

---

And that brings the new update I know it's not much and I haven't added any new transformations but I'm working on bringing as many things to this game so that in the future it's as entertaining as possible.

Enjoy!

---

The game is originally written in Spanish, I have translated it with Google so there are probably spelling problems.

---

Si hablas español y quieres jugar al juego en español también hay una versión. Juégala en el siguiente enlace

https://wolfiyt.itch.io/adventure-of-gar-na-spanish
